Pepper__bell___Bacterial_spot.description: Bacterial infection causing leaf spots and fruit lesions.
Pepper__bell___Bacterial_spot.prevention: Use disease-free seeds, avoid overhead irrigation, rotate crops.
Pepper__bell___Bacterial_spot.treatment: Apply copper-based bactericides and remove infected leaves.

Potato___Early_blight.description: Fungal disease causing brown concentric rings on leaves.

Potato___Late_blight.description: Severe fungal disease causing dark lesions and plant rot.

Tomato_Bacterial_spot.description: Bacterial disease causing black leaf spots and lesions.
Tomato_Bacterial_spot.prevention: Use clean seeds, avoid overhead watering.

Tomato_Early_blight.description: Fungal disease causing brown leaf spots.
Tomato_Early_blight.prevention: Ensure good airflow, avoid wet leaves.

Tomato_Late_blight.description: Highly destructive fungal disease causing dark lesions.

Tomato_Leaf_Mold.description: Yellow patches on the upper leaf and fuzzy mold underneath.

Tomato_Septoria_leaf_spot.description: Circular brown spots on lower leaves.
Tomato_Septoria_leaf_spot.prevention: Avoid leaf wetting, remove infected leaves.

Tomato_Spider_mites_Two_spotted_spider_m.description: Tiny pests causing leaf discoloration and webbing.
Tomato_Spider_mites_Two_spotted_spider_m.prevention: Maintain humidity and avoid plant stress.

Tomato__Target_Spot.description: Small brown spots expanding into target-like rings.
Tomato__Target_Spot.prevention: Proper spacing and avoid water on leaves.

Tomato__Tomato_YellowLeaf__Curl_Virus.description: Virus spread by whiteflies causing curling & yellowing.
Tomato__Tomato_YellowLeaf__Curl_Virus.treatment: No cure; control pests with insecticides.
